## ExpressionsServiceStart.getType property

Get a registered `ExpressionType` by its name, which was registered using the `registerType` method. The returned `ExpressionType` instance is an internal representation of the type in Expressions service - do not mutate that object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getType: (name: string) => ReturnType<Executor['getType']>;
```
